title: A sermon preached before the antient company of Black-smiths in S. Marie Magdalens Church in London on Saint Iohn Baptist day last. 1611. By William Holbrook
author: Holbrooke, William.
publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for Nathaniell Butter, dwelling at S. Austins gate in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Running title reads: A sermon preached before the Black-Smiths.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
